name: Lyman PR
tag_list: public-relations, pr, communications, communications-agency, marketing, social-media
overview:
Lyman PR is a consumer lifestyle communications agency specializing in consumer tech, mobile tech, music, hospitality and sports marketing. Seasoned in both B2C and B2B/OEM PR for consumer and SMB products.

Lyman PR delivers exceptional planning, implementation and ultimately results with services including:

  • Strategic planning, research & competitive analysis
  • Positioning and message development
  • Brand management
  • Company and product launch
  • Media relations & media training
  • Social Media
  • Crisis management & communications
  • Press release & publicity writing services
  • Press kit development
  • Business and trade press outreach
  • Analyst relations
  • Press tours
  • Trade show support
  • Speaker/editorial management and placement
  • Program measurement & tracking

milestones.description: Hincapie Sportswear Selects Lyman PR as Agency of Record
